longBusinessSummary: TOMY Company, Ltd. plans, manufactures, and sells toys, general merchandise, card games, and baby care products. It offers action figures and accessories; arts and crafts; dolls and accessories; construction toys; dressing-up and role play; games and puzzles; model vehicles; outdoor and sports toys; plush toys; radio/remote control toys; ride-on vehicles; scientific/educational toys; and other traditional educational toys and games, as well as baby and infant, and preschool products. It operates in Japan, rest of Asia, Europe, the Americas, and Oceania. The company was founded in 1924 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
